line_1: Thae curst horse-leeches o' th' Excise,
line_2: Wha mak the Whisky stells their prize!

line_1: Thae curst horse-leeches o' th' Excise,
line_2: Haud up thy han' Deil! ance, twice, thrice!

line_1: Thae curst horse-leeches o' th' Excise,
line_2: An' bake them up in brunstane pies

line_1: Corn Fairly Tax'd, and Fruits without Excise;
line_2: Bids Corn and Fruits in full perfection rise,
